column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////For Entrees we ordered the Crispy Fried Chicken sandwich
column3: and the Cornmeal Crusted Catfish. We also ordered a side of the Mac & Cheese and the Bosscat fries. Let me say this food was amazing.... Literally everything! The Chicken sandwich was fresh
column5: the coleslaw was pretty good. The Mac & Cheese was very gooey... a very gooey stringy cheese was used. It complemented the Short rib very well. And the Catfish was crispy
column7: and real fish... not that frozen stuff. You can tell this is fresh Catfish because it is not slimy!
